summary.para: Get the resource that is accessed through this view.

param.name: ppResource
param.para: Address of a pointer to the resource that is accessed through this view. (See .)

remarks.para: This function increments the reference count of the resource by one, so it is necessary to call Release on the returned pointer when the application is done with it. Destroying (or losing) the returned pointer before Release is called will result in a memory leak.

summary.para: A view interface specifies the parts of a resource the pipeline can access during rendering (see view).

remarks.para: A view interface is the base interface for all views. There are three types of views; a depth-stencil view, a render-target view, and a shader-resource view.
